installH1.message: To start, you need to pair this extension with the 2FAS Auth mobile application.

installScan.message: Scan this code with your 2FAS Auth mobile app

installStep2.message: Go to Settings â†’ Browser Extension

installStep3.message: Tap "Pair with web browser" and scan the QR code
